TopicTitle: how big are the planets really?

Articles.Content:
hi, recently i have been looking and flying to all the new planets in 0.17, and i just felt that i cant get the real scale of the planets. i don't feel dwarfed by jool as i should. so my challenge is to get into a (roughly) 200 k orbit around each planet and its moons and picture each one. then piece them together in order to show the true size of these new planets and moons.

this can also be a way to motivate all players to visit all places and possibly scan these moons and planets for the answer to the Duna Puzzle

this can also be a community project if needed, I will also help when possible but I have very limited time due to school work/exams and family issues.

P.S this can be done on multiple missions and all mods can be used.

P.P.S as far as i can tell this wont work with kerbol as it stops zooming in after some point.
i know that's why i said this wouldn't work for kerbol

You die at 4000k from Kerbol...

You die somewhere between 50km and 100km.
